channel.title: Copy of Digg top 24 hours

item.description: Darth Vader has a new girlfriend, and Luke is pissed.

item.description: I KEN HALPZ U KLEEN TEH BLINZ?

item.title: [+1025] Inside the HDMI cable scam
item.description: "Have you seen HDMI cables online or in stores labeled '120 Hz,' '240Hz' and '480 Hz'? It's easy enough to slap such labels on HDMI cables but it's a sham. HDMI cables can no more be manufactured for specific refresh-rate HDTVs than a garden hose can be manufactured specifically to water seeded lawns and sod lawns. The same water flows through..."

item.title: [+975] Futurama- 'Sweet' Clyde's inversion theory. (Pic)
item.description: I wasn't sure Clyde had it right, so I made a chart and you know what, Sweet Clyde Dixion knows his stuff. No matter how many people there are all you need is two extra players. If only the professor knew his math all this mess could of been avoided and Scruffy wouldn't of had his heart broken.

item.title: [+928] This is what happens when I tell people I'm colorblind [PIC]
[+773] Jimmy Kimmel: "Obama Can Prove He is NOT a Muslim" [VIDEO]
item.description: Here is video of comedian Jimmy Kimmel showing us how President Obama can “prove he is not a Muslim.” Kimmel cited recent polling that indicates 18% of Americans believe Obama is a Muslim. After pointing out that Obama is now vacationing on Martha’s Vineyard in a home that “has an unobstructed view of the Atlantic – toward Mecca......”

item.title: [+730] Montreal nightclub comes out and declares “NO FAT GIRLS!!!"
item.description: Muzique nightclub in Montreal is feeling the heat after posting an invitation on its Facebook page that included the message "NO FAT GIRLS ALLOWED!!!!!!!!!!" the Montreal Gazette reports. Stefano Apostolakos, a Montreal club promoter, told the Gazette: "Everybody knows. (Clubs) are selective," and "(Discrimination) comes with the right to refuse..

item.title: [+697] Meet The YouTube Stars Making $100,000 Plus Per Year
item.description: There are at least 10 independent YouTube stars who made over $100,000 in the past year, according to a study done by analytics and advertising company TubeMogul who used their viewership data to estimate the annual income for independent YouTube partners, which they define as anyone who is not part of a media company or brand.

item.title: [+633] Apple patenting kill switch that detects jailbroken iPhones
item.description: A recent patent filed by Apple would allow Apple to remotely detect if your phone is jailbroken, and could allow your carrier to remotely shut down or cripple your device.

item.title: [+513] How Fox News Betrayed General Petraeus
item.description: The rage over the “ground zero mosque” is not motivated by a serious desire to protect America, but by a desire for for an election-season payoff.

item.title: [+435] 6 Movie Heroes Who Actually Made Things Worse
item.description: Seriously, can you even call these people heroes?

item.title: [+422] We Require More Minerals
item.description: At least it’s not vespene gas

item.title: [+422] WTF: Two 2ft long rats were caught in a factory
item.description: Rentokil spokesman Malcolm Padley said: "They were both around 2ft and it's fair to say our technicians were very surprised at the size.
